channel.title: Why Does It Take So Long to Get Back In?
channel.description:
On my server, after you logout it takes forever to log back in, you have to press the login button forever until you get lucky. Is this because the run.bat is busy with all the other players saving and such or something else?
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: Why Does It Take So Long to Get Back In?
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

Ok, I’m gonna try that…

Uh, no, found this little tid bit it my playerhandler

public static final int maxPlayers = 200;

Thanks though Anyone else?

Read full topic
item.source: Why Does It Take So Long to Get Back In?

item.title: Why Does It Take So Long to Get Back In?

item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

that’d be becuase your max amount of players is 20, change it to like 50
